H0.text: Glass rod is the best conductor of electricity.

H1.text: A wooden stick is the best conductor of electricity.

H2.text: Plastic straw is the best conductor of electricity.

H3.text: A metal nail is the best conductor of electricity.

A4.text: A conductor such as a metal has high conductivity and a low resistivity.

A5.text: Wood is widely regarded as an extremely good insulator, but its resistivity is sensitively dependent on moisture content, with damp wood being a factor of at least 1010 worse insulator than oven-dry.
